articles.description:
Join one of our community managers @wc49358 as he discusses how to increase engagement within DAOs.  We look forward into checking this out.  IYKYK

Push Protocol | Push Chat Alpha is LIVE: How to enhance your DAO and increase user engagement?🔔💬
Join our TS discussion next week to discuss alongside @AragonProject ecosystem lead @TheTakenUser & @developer_dao community lead @wc49358. Hosted by @jafetsc✨
🗓️ Tuesday, June 20
⏰ 5pm UTC
🔗 https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1OyKAVgPOPLGb https://t.co/niFXk1enPz

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Priyank Gupta
Published an article on incorporating @chainlink VRF with Foundry. Includes testing with a mock contract.
Could not get a local chainlink node running for a better test suite.
Maybe later one day will cover that too.

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Do you need some random numbers in your smart contracts and have some time to spare?
Check out @PriyankGupta03's developer guide to @chainlink VRF with Foundry!
https://buff.ly/3Jgje0S

articles.description:
RT Angus Maidment
Come learn about building zkapps on @MinaProtocol in this workshop I am doing next week with @developer_dao!!

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Did someone say zkApps? 👀⛓️🔐
Join us for the workshop as we host @blockchainbeard from @MinaProtocol to get us all started building zkApps using Typescript and SnarkyJS. 
https://lu.ma/jypdmapk https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1668614070293987328
